actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend a provision of the Internal Revenue Code dealing with involuntary conversions of broadcast property.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit the reinvestment of proceeds from the sale or exchange of a radio or television broadcasting station required to effectuate policies of the Federal Communications Commission (FCC) in a newspaper without the loss of preferential tax treatment (i.e. nonrecognition of the gain from such sale or exchange as an involuntary conversion).

titles.title: A bill to amend a provision of the Internal Revenue Code dealing with involuntary conversions of broadcast property.
